thread.title: Emmerdale wedding, police drama and airport shock 10 spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
thread.title_full: Emmerdale wedding, police drama and airport shock 10 spoilers and episode guide | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Emmerdale wedding, police drama and airport shock 10 spoilers and episode guide | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 4:55 pm (Picture: ITV) 
Several Emmerdale residents are toying with trouble as they are risking prison – so what else is new? As Debbie Dingle heads to the airport with Sarah Sugden armed with a fake passport, will she be caught? Meanwhile Aaron’s future is looking bleak as he is sentenced to a year in prison. 
The scenes are not all sad and miserable though as the Robron wedding dawns at last, with Robert Sugden springing a huge surprise on the man that he loves. But will they get the day of their dreams and end the ceremony as husbands? 
We have rounded up all of the latest Emmerdale spoilers and followed it up with an in depth episode guide. 10 Emmerdale spoilers It’s the day that Robron fans have been waiting for as Robert and Aaron prepare to wed but will everything go to plan? After a warning from Gabby, Laurel confronts Will over their suspicions that he fancies her. Debbie decides to take Sarah to Prague herself but will her fake passport be her undoing? Aaron’s loved ones are left shattered when he is sentenced to a year in prison. David determines to prove to Tracy that he can still be exciting in the bedroom. Laurel is devastated when it becomes clear that Ashley is forgetting her. Liv lashes out at Doug when he slates her family. Later she is glad to have her friend back when Jacob dumps Gabby. Paddy and Chas have a heart to heart over their relationship. Rakesh and Priya’s relationship is back on and getting steamy but they are soon outed by Brenda. Zak and Lisa allow Kerry to accompany them to a meeting with social services about Kyle but will their chances be jeopardised? Monday 20th February (Picture: ITV) 
Robert plans to marry Aaron and the residents help him to put together a special day in the Woolpack. Paddy expresses doubts but Cain intervenes and ensure Aaron is in the right place at the right time. As the romantic ceremony gets underway, though, the police burst in. 
Zak and Lisa reluctantly allow Kerry to attend a meeting with social services alongside them but will she ruin their chances of bringing Kyle home? David determines to prove that reality is better than fiction in the bedroom but his plans backfire. 
Sarah lets slip that she is getting treatment in Prague while Paddy and Chas have a heart to heart over their relationship. Tuesday 21st February 
Robert and Aaron’s wedding day descends into chaos. Why are the police here and while they manage to get married? (Picture: ITV) Debbie agrees to let Charity take Sarah to Prague after the Dingles warn her about her criminal record. Laurel leans on Will on the anniversary of Daniel’s death. David visits his doctor while Paddy opens up about his relationship status to Marlon. Wednesday 22nd February Thursday 23rd February Part One (Picture: ITV) Aaron’s loved ones are distraught when he is sentenced to a year in prison. Gabby warns Laurel that she thinks Will fancies her. Debbie asks Ross to supply her with a fake passport after reconsidering going to Prague again.
Liv feels pushed out when Gabby gets together with Jacob while Paddy remains sad over Chas. Thursday 23rd February Part Two 
HOUR LONG EPISODE. 
Debbie heads to the airport with Sarah, armed with her fake passport. But after a near miss, she begins to fear that she will be caught. Is she about to risk everything? Liv takes revenge on Doug after hearing him diss her family. (Picture: ITV) Laurel confronts Will over his apparent crush on her. Sandy seems reluctant to visit Ashley.
Priya and Rakesh get steamy in the office while Aaron struggles behind bars. Friday 24th February (Picture: ITV) Liv is pleased to have her friend back when Jacob calls off his romance with Gabby but what is behind his change of heart? Debbie fears that she has put Sarah in harm’s way.
Laurel takes Ashley for a picnic but is left heartbroken when she realises that he is forgetting her. Jai discovers that Rakesh and Priya are back together after Brenda outs them. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
